metadata.title: CVE-2024-52798 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: path-to-regexp turns path strings into a regular expressions. In certaincases, path-to-regexp will output a regular expression that can beexploited to cause poor performance. The regular expression that isvulnerable to backtracking can be generated in the 0.1.x release ofpath-to-regexp. Upgrade to 0.1.12. This vulnerability exists because of anincomplete fix for CVE-2024-45296.

criterions.comment: node-path-to-regexp package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
